attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LOVMTZzKdDPBN6QCWT-_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Bludgeoning, Alternate Damage: 1d10, Alternate Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LOVMYZMXAXaJtdfBQWW_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LOVMYZMXAXaJtdfBQWW_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMbu1O2S8K8JVvePt_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMbu1O2S8K8JVvePt_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMg5ME14Wo4vHaMyY_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMg5ME14Wo4vHaMyY_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMg5ME14Wo4vHaMyY_spelldescription
attribs.current: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMj3sOZaZV4IqOUfz_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMj3sOZaZV4IqOUfz_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMj3sOZaZV4IqOUfz_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMmF1nK-f4r0ZJC1V_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMmF1nK-f4r0ZJC1V_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMmF1nK-f4r0ZJC1V_spelldescription
attribs.current: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMyhsfVKx8kaEPmsf_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMyhsfVKx8kaEPmsf_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOVMyhsfVKx8kaEPmsf_spelldescription
attribs.current: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LOVNALdiKhOliZ98Jns_description
attribs.current: Also starting at 1st level, whenever you use a spell of 1st level or higher to restore hit points to a creature, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LOVNMyzFLshs35OXF0U_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LOVNZLyJ7zbw3p5Yrof_description
attribs.current:
Always on the lookout for danger, you gain the following benefits:

You can't be surprised while you are conscious.
You gain a +5 bonus to initiative.
Other creatures don't gain advantage on attack rolls against you as a result of being unseen by you.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LOVNvA8t2YR9c6KZkht_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOVO1eCG1437Hg8HUIe_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOVO3QdKbP5WpmLdjQP_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOVO3QdKbP5WpmLdjQP_spelldescription
attribs.current: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOVO4UYa-0c52xRqdZ-_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOVO4UYa-0c52xRqdZ-_spelldescription
attribs.current: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBfpnX2IdzMmQnCtC4_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBft7BmXapNWE47Zuh_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot 3rd level of or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above the 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBft7BmXapNWE47Zuh_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spells effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgBT5zPs4ZF6zZkRY_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgBT5zPs4ZF6zZkRY_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgBT5zPs4ZF6zZkRY_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgFluLCzhwMzbBbVe_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgFluLCzhwMzbBbVe_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny strip of white cloth

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgFluLCzhwMzbBbVe_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a targets hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LXBgFluLCzhwMzbBbVe_spelldescription
attribs.current: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each targets hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LXBgp-yOqOMlzWOGevd_spelldescription
attribs.current: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell doesnt protect the warded creature from area effects, such as the explosion of a fireball. If the warded creature makes an attack or casts a spell that affects an enemy creature, this spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LXBgr9K0eYc5a30p-UF_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LXBgr9K0eYc5a30p-UF_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LYNw-1RwUEO-CiEb-zD_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Fur or a feather from a beast

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LYNw-1RwUEO-CiEb-zD_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LYNw-1RwUEO-CiEb-zD_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement. Choose one of the following effects; the target gains that effect until the spell ends. Bears Endurance. The target has advantage on Constitution checks. It also gains 2d6 temporary hit points, which are lost when the spell ends. Bulls Strength. The target has advantage on Strength checks, and his or her carrying capacity doubles. Cats Grace. The target has advantage on Dexterity checks. It also doesnt take damage from falling 20 feet or less if it isnt incapacitated. Eagles Splendor. The target has advantage on Charisma checks. Foxs Cunning. The target has advantage on Intelligence checks. Owls Wisdom. The target has advantage on Wisdom checks.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTPOtFgxrRHFzaKPF_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that has died within the last minute

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTPOtFgxrRHFzaKPF_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTPOtFgxrRHFzaKPF_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell cant return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTRYxCHzvlw2MYlRw_spelltarget
attribs.current: Any number of creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTRYxCHzvlw2MYlRw_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPThodGeuJfQvXnaMg_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPThodGeuJfQvXnaMg_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPThodGeuJfQvXnaMg_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTjoPi114wcq2rizd_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYPTjoPi114wcq2rizd_spelldescription
attribs.current: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish. When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creatures speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LbGWsOUvC5PDkRQakiZ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar. The creature hears the message in its mind, recognizes you as the sender if it knows you, and can answer in a like manner immediately. The spell enables creatures with Intelligence scores of at least 1 to understand the meaning of your message. You can send the message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but if the target is on a different plane than you, there is a 5 percent chance that the message doesnt arrive.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LbGWsOUvC5PDkRQakiZ_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A short piece of fine copper wire

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LbGWsOUvC5PDkRQakiZ_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature with which you are familiar

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LbUZfgV30Gcz3yBXJFm_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You perform a special religious ceremony that is infused with magic. When you cast the spell, choose one of the following rites, the target of which must be within 10 feet of you throughout the casting.
Atonement. You touch one willing creature whose alignment has changed, and you make a DC 20 Wisdom (Insight) check. On a successful check, you restore the target to its original alignment.
Bless Water. You touch one vial of water and cause it to become holy water.
Coming of Age. You touch one humanoid who is a young adult. For the next 24 hours, whenever the target makes an ability check, it can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check. A creature can benefit from this rite only once.
Dedication. You touch one humanoid who wishes to be dedicated to your gods service. For the next 24 hours, whenever the target makes a saving throw, it can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the save. A creature can benefit from this rite only once.
Funeral Rite. You touch one corpse, and for the next 7 days, the target cant become undead by any means short of a wish spell.
Wedding. You touch adult humanoids willing to be bonded together in marriage. For the next 7 days, each target gains a +2 bonus to AC while they are within 30 feet of each other. A creature can benefit from this rite again only if widowed.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LbUZfgV30Gcz3yBXJFm_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: 25 gp worth of powdered silver,which the spell consume

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LbUgFhRzo7tvp0yHccV_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish. When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creatures speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LcOXz-Zha2fGiOKpVWb_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LcOXz-Zha2fGiOKpVWb_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small, straight piece of iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LcOXz-Zha2fGiOKpVWb_spelltarget
attribs.current: A humanoid that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LcOXz-Zha2fGiOKpVWb_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target on additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.
